ygData.subject: Re: Using Trade window against KSers.
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/3/99 1:51:32 PM Central Daylight Time, warpig@one.net writes:
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/3/99 1:51:32 PM Central Daylight Time, warpig@...
writes:

<< Thats fine but be warned you can get banned for it. Just like you can get
banned for cussing EVEN though there is a /filter command which turns off
cusswords. >>

Disclaimer > Mr. Daniels. This is _not_ directed personally to you or anyone
else in particular, just a rant in general.

I couldn't give a RATS A$$ if they ban me or not.. as a matter of fact, it
probably would do me good to get back to real life and out of Norrath. But
the fact of the matter is this. Bannable or not, Kill Stealing and the jerks
that propagate the kill stealers are the problem.

When I walk up to an area that has people already hunting, I ask if they
would mind if I joined the rotation. I expect the same courtesy of others.
Even if they dont ask, but leave me alone when I engage a foe, this is fine
and again I will reciprocate. (Kinda like a silent aggreement) But if someone
is BLATENTLY killstealing, I will ask them nicely to stop and again ask if
they would like to join my group or join the rotation. If they continue to
killsteal, my prostestations will increase in response. At a certain point in
time (where if in a PvP setting I would attack) I do..

I will cast to interrupt
I will trade to interrupt
I will engage the MOB and then turn off auto -attack
I will petition
I will spam
I will shout
I will do ANYTHING and EVERYTHING in my power to make that GREEDY,
UNCOOPERATIVE, CRASS, RUDE JERK's life, as miserable as he's making mine and
others he bullies.

Yes.. these people are either bullies, or the ones pushed around by bullies
or just plain spoiled brats who, their entire lives, got whatever they wanted
and never suffered the consequences of their actions.

I will not walk away. I will not give in. I know others will say that * I *
am the one with the problem. Maybe so.. but if giving and asking for common
courtesy and recieving instead malicious killstealing and smug, "you can't
touch me so live with it" attitudes while simply tucking my tail and letting
the bully have his way is the right thing to do.. then I guess I'll be banned.

I would rather be banned than be bullied by children and social miscreants.
I'll take my chances with the GM's.

Fight fire with fire.

Grannus
